name: Card Game Builder
description:
Make (almost) anything in your FigJam file into a virtual playing card or flashcard.


Supported card types

  • images
  • drawings & shapes
  • icons
  • text & notecards
  • text from a CSV file


Supported actions

  • flipping front and back
  • shuffling
  • dealing
  • discarding
  • score keeping


Hint: cut & paste cards into a new file for privacy


Made with love by @bket, @dwins and @naomi
